question: 13 days up but still didn't get my periods?
question_content: I am 20 years old...my last period date was 12 june but its 24 july but still i didn't get my periods.its been 13 days up but still I didn't get my periods and I am virgin.I am so much worried because this thing never happened to me before.Please help me I am so much tensed

answers.answer_content:
Happened to me almost my entire life (I'm only 21). I never had a regular period, even when I started taking BC pills to regulate it. My cycle has JUST started coming somewhat around the same time.
If you're stressed out about it then it's gonna take a little longer to come. Try to relax. That's also prevented my cycle from coming a few times.

Hope  it works out!
Most women have irregular periods.  This is just your first one, but not the last one.  It will show up.  Many things can change your pattern.  Nothing to worry about if you are a virgin.
